name.ja: セレブラウス・デスワンショルダー

summoning_condition.en: This card's name becomes "Charis Magic Scepter - Death Wand" while in the Graveyard.

requirement.en: Equip to 1 face-up monster on your field.

effect.en: If you use the equipped monster as material for a Fusion Summon, its name can be treated as "Celeb Rose Sorcerer". During your opponent's turn, while the equipped monster is face-up on your field, it cannot be returned to the hand, Deck, or Extra Deck by card effects.
